description:
If you're looking for a powerful Seattle advocate for your personal injury case, you might have heard of Menzer Law Firm, PLLC. We represent people in Washington who have suffered injuries caused by someone else's negligence or who have lost their loved ones to these circumstances. No one should suffer this grief or pain, but it happens every day.

The types of personal injury cases we handle

Since we opened our doors in 2002, our personal injury cases have spanned a wide range. Here are some of the many cases we handle on behalf of our clients:

• Medical malpractice
• Wrongful death
• Life and accidental death insurance
• Birth injury
• Vaccine reactions
• Nursing home and elder abuse

What our clients say about Menzer Law Firm, PLLC

Our clients have commended our team for resolving long-standing cases they were battling for years before we took over. We have also been complimented on our ability to show compassion to our clients and then take a more aggressive stance against our common opposing party in the courtroom.

While we do not win all of our cases, it is always our No. 1 goal. We provide a free initial consultation, so you can take the time you need to share the details without worrying about upfront costs.
